+{
+"name": "auth-backend",
+"version": "1.0.0",
+"main": "dist/index.js",
+"scripts": {
+"dev": "ts-node-dev --respawn --transpile-only src/index.ts",
+"build": "tsc",
+"start": "node dist/index.js"
+},
+"dependencies": {
+"bcrypt": "^5.1.0",
+"cors": "^2.8.5",
+"dotenv": "^16.0.0",
+"express": "^4.18.2",
+"jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.0",

+"@types/node": "^20.0.0",
+"@types/jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.1",

+}
+}
\ No newline at end of file

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "name": "backend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "dev": "ts-node src/index.ts",
  "build": "tsc",
  "start": "node dist/index.js"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "type": "commonjs",
  "dependencies": {
    "bcrypt": "^6.0.0",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "dotenv": "^17.2.3",
    "express": "^5.1.0",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2",
    "mongoose": "^8.19.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@types/cors": "^2.8.19",
    "@types/express": "^5.0.3",
    "@types/node": "^24.6.2",
    "nodemon": "^3.1.10",
    "ts-node": "^10.9.2",
    "typescript": "^5.9.3"
  }
}
